body: I would need to see how it is done in Python but yeah, could be an idea! Can we support it in a second phase? (i.e. create a second `create` factory method that accepts an `Operand` )?
body_html: I would need to see how it is done in Python but yeah, could be an idea! Can we support it in a second phase? (i.e. create a second create factory method that accepts an Operand )?
body_text: I would need to see how it is done in Python but yeah, could be an idea! Can we support it in a second phase? (i.e. create a second create factory method that accepts an Operand )?
